column1: Voters are recognizing Dusty’s hard work. Only 13% disapprove of the job he’s doing.   Keep working for the USA and South Dakota Dusty!  https://t.co/WqHrUQHAQY

@DustysPinkTie @RepDustyJohnson The last week I‘ve wished twitter had a greater variety of response buttons. Everything @DustysPinkTie posts is funny but oddly disturbing. I don’t feel like I should “heart” them but some type of recognition seems warranted.
@A_DrewSmith On Wednesdays I wear orange. https://t.co/f3qYvkLBvO
@hobysd @forsouthdakota I made a donation to Down Syndrome Diagnosis Network in honor of my delightful niece Delilah!
@A_DrewSmith @DustysPinkTie is so needy. A tie has to earn its way into the rotation. Whining won’t cut it.
Owen thought his friend Dennis looked cold so we stopped to help. Happy Thanksgiving! https://t.co/vo2IR9DZHI
It’s a good day for football. https://t.co/0tyKYA39fh
If you've been watching the impeachment hearings you know my friend @EliseStefanik. In recent weeks we've both been under attack and we need your help. Donate today.  https://t.co/2vnRiZxh01
@LisaKaczke Lisa please don’t call this “my tie.” I don’t really wear it.   Given the drama @DustysPinkTie stirs up it’s no wonder it’s been out of the rotation for months.
@DustysPinkTie Listen I’m not getting into a debate with a piece of fabric.
@DustysPinkTie Funny I’ll admit.

@Boomingbox You’ll be happy to know I voted IN SUPPORT of the censure resolution on Monday.  Also here I am last week on the House floor criticizing the Democrats impeachment effort.   https://t.co/pqhQn34ngn

“[Black US House Republican Will] Hurd said Reps. Fitzpatrick (PA) & Dusty Johnson (SD) are 2 members trying to make the party more diverse & inclusive.”  Dusty believes in freedom & opportunity. He’s going to keep sharing that message w all people!  https://t.co/1w9Z49Ex1u
Thank you Mr. President for inviting me to help welcome Australian Prime Minister Scott Morrison to the White House this morning.   It was an honor. https://t.co/XioQtrYwVC
These pictures remind me how much I loved being in the trenches with Deb Bowman. Working with her was an education an adventure and an honor. https://t.co/Gq0yPrjP6R
Few SD traditions rival the Wagner Labor Day Parade! https://t.co/dl1R7X3lQa
It’s hard to beat the State Fair for talkin’ shop. https://t.co/5ZX7q5ty6g
Every single day Dusty talks to South Dakotans about the challenges and opportunities facing our nation.  #MostLocal.  #MostAccessible. https://t.co/XklzrWjoVt
You see all kinds of fun outfits at Dakotafest. 😊 https://t.co/jZ3Uz3fNuf

“I want to be a workhorse and not a showhorse and people recognize that. I think that is why we lead [all House freshman] in local donations . . . people see the work we are doing."  https://t.co/ZwThotNYaA

Only 1% of AOC’s donations came from within her district.  Dusty (with 94%) was at other end of the spectrum:  “Leading the freshman class in receiving the greatest share of itemized contributions from their constituents was [GOP] Rep. Dusty Johnson.”  https://t.co/yz8zd5Fjvp
Summer fairs are better with help. Thanks to son Ben and friend Andy for helping me tonight! https://t.co/BOKfNq12En
Chislic Festival  AWESOME https://t.co/yQ16CpQsba
Busy Saturday.   Mitchell parade cleaning up storm damage watching Ben play in the state baseball tournament. https://t.co/jxHCc2OgLC
Laurie is a true professional. Great hire. https://t.co/kFKHqmPxbY
@Doctor_Lesleigh Lesleigh I did vote for a clean reauthorization of of VAWA. I was disappointed we didn’t get that version passed.
@SenStaceNelson @SDCookieMonster @KevinWoster For context this score puts me in the top 25% most conservative House members.
Thanks to both the Pine Ridge and Lennox student sections for inviting me over.   Plenty of spirit at the state A tourney! https://t.co/CPZGLBsNPZ
A few sights from the class A state tournament. https://t.co/4UElKjUkD1

@KevinWoster Roger that. I was responding to @BlackHillsBum. He‘s added context so I understand now what he meant.  Re: numbers I haven’t yet totaled letters texts cell/office calls official/political Twitter messages campaign/political FB messages.   Certainly north of a thousand.

@blackhillsbum @KevinWoster These aren’t votes cast after careful political calculation (obviously!).  These are votes that reflect my long-held and well-articulated beliefs.   I’m a big fan of the Constitution including parts about both separation of powers & gun rights.
Here’s Dusty answering questions before the USF Women’s game at the Pentagon.   Fee free to stop by before the Augustana game tonight if you want to talk! https://t.co/VYSp0KPunw
@ScottReports @smarvel_AAN If it helps I’m willing to send her an audio clip of me reading them! (dj)
@ValerieNeuharth @govkristinoem That’s fantastic! PM me an address and I’ll send over a thank you note. No one has ever made me look that muscular before!
